definition_en: (heading) To guide or conduct.
meanings_ja: 指導した、指揮した (in a more formal or official sense)
example: The teacher led the class in a discussion about the importance of recycling. / 教師はリサイクルの重要性についてクラスを指導した。

definition_en: A tool for finding whether a surface is level, or for creating a horizontal or vertical line of reference.
example: The new video game is on a higher level than before. / 新しいビデオゲームは今昔より高いレベルです。

definition_en: To cause (something) to cease to be in one's possession or capability due to unfortunate or unknown circumstances, events or reasons.
example: The team loses the game. / チームはゲームを落としてしまった。

definition_en: (usually transitive, sometimes intransitive, stative) To have a strong affection for (someone or something).
example: She loved her childhood memories. / 彼女は彼女の童年記憶を好きなものとしていた。

definition_en: Something that is low; a low point.
example: The temperature is low today. / 今日の気温は低いです。

definition_en: Situated close to, or even below, the ground or another normal reference plane; not high or lofty.
example: The company's profits will lower next quarter. / その会社の利益は次四半期に下げる。

definition_en: The act of forming, causing, or constituting; workmanship; construction.
meanings_ja: 手続き, 作業 (other senses of "making")
example: I'm making a plan. / 私は計画を描いている。

definition_en: A gathering of people for the purchase and sale of merchandise at a set time, often periodic.
meanings_ja: 取引市場 (stock market, financial market) / 取引所 (marketplace)
example: The company is expanding its markets in Asia. / その会社はアジアの商取引を拡大しています。

definition_en: The state of being married.
meanings_ja: 婚姻の状態 (more formal or official sense)
example: She's been married for five years. / 彼女は5年間結婚しています。

definition_en: Substance, material.
meanings_ja: 問題, 事故 (in formal or technical contexts)
example: The matter is whether we can solve this problem in time. / その問題は、我々が時間内に解決できるかどうかです。

definition_en: To intend.
example: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings. / 僕は、あなたの気持ちを傷つけることを思っていませんでした。

definition_en: The middle layer of the wall of a blood vessel or lymph vessel which is composed of connective and muscular tissue.
meanings_ja: 大衆マスメディア, 通信メディア (主要な意味を2つ挙げました)
example: The media has been covering the news story extensively. / メディアはそのニュースストーリーについて広く報道しています。

definition_en: (gerund) The act of persons or things that meet.
example: I have a meeting with my boss tomorrow. / 私は明日上司と会談します。

definition_en: To make a short reference to something.
example: The meeting was mentioned several times, but I couldn't attend. / 会議が幾度もありえていたが、私は参加できなかった。

definition_en: Power, strength, force or influence held by a person or group.
example: The team might win if they play well. / チームは好きなようにプレーすれば勝つ可能性があります。
Her name is Mika. / 彼女の名前はミカです。

definition_en: A kinetic sculpture or decorative arrangement made of items hanging so that they can move independently from each other.
example: I need to make a call on my mobile phone. / 私のケータイで電話したいです。

definition_en: To change place or posture; to go, in any manner, from one place or position to another.
example: The crowd was moved by the musician's performance. / 音楽家のパフォーマンスに動かされたクラウドがあった。

definition_en: To change place or posture; to go, in any manner, from one place or position to another.
meanings_ja: 動く (dōku) / 進む (susumu) - This refers to physical movement or motion.
感動的 (kanjō-teki) - This implies emotional or sentimental significance, such as a moving experience or a moving story.
example: The moving company will handle all the logistics. / 損害会社は全てのロジスティクスを処理します。

definition_en: (usually with the definite article) A place to do the "necessary" business of urination and defecation: an outhouse or lavatory.
example: It's necessary to finish the project by Friday. / そのプロジェクトは金曜日まで終わる必要があります。

definition_en: To have an absolute requirement for.
example: I needed a map to find my way. / 私はマップが欲しかった。

definition_en: Of necessity; necessarily; indispensably; used with an auxiliary verb (often must), and equivalent to "of need".
example: She has many needs in her life. / 她の生活には多くの必要があります。

meanings_ja: アメリカの宇宙飛行士
example: Neil Armstrong was the first person to walk on the moon. / アームストロングは月面歩行を行った最初の人間だった。

definition_en: (heading) A symbol or annotation.
meanings_ja: 記述、注釈 (in academic or professional contexts)
example: I took notes during the meeting. / ビジネスミーティングで音符を取った。

definition_en: A proposal that has been made.
example: "I'd like to offer you a drink." / "私たちはあなたに飲み物を出します。"

definition_en: To propose or express one's willingness (to do something).
meanings_ja: 提案した, 出しいた (in some cases)
example: The company offered me a job. / その会社は私に仕事を提示しました。

definition_en: A subjective belief, judgment or perspective that a person has formed about a topic, issue, person or thing.
example: I have a strong opinion about this movie. / 私はこの映画について強い評判を持っています。

definition_en: A chance for advancement, progress or profit.
example: I didn't take the opportunity to travel abroad when I was younger. / 私は若い時期に海外旅行するチャンスを逃した。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) Us; the group including the speaker as the object of a verb or preposition when that group also is the subject.
example: We should think about ourselves. / 我々は自分たちのことを考えるべきです。

definition_en: An ache or bodily suffering, or an instance of this; an unpleasant sensation, resulting from a derangement of functions, disease, or injury by violence; hurt.
example: The patient felt a sharp pain in her knee. / 腕に鋭い疵痛を感じた。

meanings_ja: パトリック (name) - A masculine given name, often associated with Saint Patrick.
(patorikku) (game) - A type of card game where players try to get rid of all their cards first.
example: My friend's name is Patrick. / 私の友達の名前はパトリックです。

definition_en: For each.
example: The company pays $50 per employee. / その会社は一人当たりに5000円を支払う。

definition_en: An uncertainty.
meanings_ja: 何かありえないかもしれない
example: I'll go to the party perhaps tonight. / 今夜にはパーティに行くかもしれない。

definition_en: One that plays
meanings_ja: パーシャー（スポーツチームのメンバー）
example: The players in the soccer game were very skilled. / サッカー試合の選手たちは非常に優秀でした。

definition_en: A state of being pleased or contented; gratification.
example: I got great pleasure from reading that book. / 私はその本を読むことで大いに楽しんだ。

definition_en: A more-than-adequate amount.
example: I have plenty of time to finish this project. / これらのプロジェクトを終わらせる時間があふれている。

definition_en: A place or location.
example: The company wants to improve its position in the market. / その会社は市場での立場を改善したいと考えている。

definition_en: A thing capable of being affirmed; something real or actual.
example: The company's positive response to our proposal was impressive. / その会社は、私たちの提案に対するいい感じの反応だった。

definition_en: A possible one.
example: It's possible to finish the project within a week. / 一週間でプロジェクトを完了することができます。

definition_en: Having, or capable of exerting power, potency or influence.
example: The powerful storm destroyed the city. / 強力な嵐が都市を壊した。

definition_en: To be in the habit of choosing something rather than something else; to favor; to like better.
example: I prefer reading books over watching TV. / 私は本を読むのをテレビを見るよりも好む。

definition_en: A device used to apply pressure to an item.
example: I'm feeling the press of time to finish this project. / 時間の迫りがこのプロジェクトを完了するのを感じている。

definition_en: The cost required to gain possession of something.
example: The prices of housing have increased dramatically. / 実家の価格は大幅に増加した。

definition_en: A soldier of the lowest rank in the army.
example: I try to keep my private life out of the media spotlight. / 私的生活をメディアのスポットライトから外します。

definition_en: In all likelihood.
meanings_ja: ほぼ、たいてい (when implying high likelihood)
example: I'll probably go to the park tomorrow. / あした公園に行くかもしれません。

definition_en: A commodity offered for sale.
example: The company's new product is very popular. / その会社の新しい製品は非常に人気です。

definition_en: A commodity offered for sale.
meanings_ja: 生成物 (for products in a broader sense, e.g. results of a process)
example: Our company produces high-quality products that meet customer needs. / 我々の会社は、カスタマーのニーズに応じた高質な製品を生産しています。

definition_en: To keep safe; to defend; to guard; to prevent harm coming to.
meanings_ja: 保護する (especially in a more formal or official sense)
example: The government will protect its citizens from external threats. / 国政府は外部の脅威から国民を守る。

definition_en: Feeling honoured (by something); feeling happy or satisfied about an event or fact; gratified.
example: I'm proud to be a part of this team. / これらのチームの一員であることを自慢しています。

definition_en: The people in general, regardless of membership of any particular group.
example: The public is invited to attend the concert. / púbic wa koncert ni toukuyou suru.

definition_en: An act of pulling (applying force)
meanings_ja: 引っ張る (physical force), 取り組む (to work hard)
example: I need to pull all night to finish this project. / 私はこのプロジェクトを終わらすため、夜中まで引く必要があります。

definition_en: (heading) To the greatest extent or degree; completely, entirely.
example: I'm quite tired. / 私はかなり疲れました。

definition_en: An increase in wages or salary; a rise (UK).
meanings_ja: 高める、上げる (in a figurative sense, e.g. raising one's voice or raising an issue)
example: Can you raise your hand if you agree with me? / はなたの手を上げてください、もし私と同意すると

definition_en: About, regarding, with reference to; especially in letters, documents and emails.
meanings_ja: 回答 (in response to a question)
example: The company will re-launch its new product. / その新製品は再びリースにします。

definition_en: A cause:
example: I gave her a good reason to stay. / 彼女に留まるための良い理由を与えた。

definition_en: A cause:
meanings_ja: 原因 (mainly used in scientific or philosophical contexts)
example: The company cited economic reasons for laying off employees. / その会社は経済的な理由で従業員を解雇した。

definition_en: Having happened a short while ago.
example: The company has had several recent successes. / 会社は数回の新しい成功経験を持っています。

definition_en: In the recent past
example: I haven't been to the gym recently. / 私は最近ジムに行ってない。

definition_en: To cause one to experience a memory (of someone or something); to bring to the notice or consideration (of a person).
example: The teacher's words reminded me to finish my homework. / 教師の言葉が私の宿題を終わることを叫び起こした。

definition_en: The act of removing something.
meanings_ja: 消去する, 解除する
example: I will remove the old software to install a new one. / 私は古いソフトウェアを取除して、新しいものをインストールします。

definition_en: A piece of information describing, or an account of certain events given or presented to someone, with the most common adpositions being by (referring to creator of the report) and on (referring to the subject).
example: The company received several reports about the new product. / その会社は新製品について複数の報告を受けた。

definition_en: Diligent inquiry or examination to seek or revise facts, principles, theories, applications, etc.; laborious or continued search after truth.
example: The company is conducting research on new product development. / その会社は新製品の開発に関する科学的調査を行っています。

definition_en: An attitude of consideration or high regard
example: I have great respect for my teachers. / 私の教師には大変な尊敬があります。

definition_en: That which results; the conclusion or end to which any course or condition of things leads, or which is obtained by any process or operation; consequence or effect.
example: The experiment yielded unexpected results. /実験は想定外の結果を得た。

definition_en: The act or result of rolling, or state of being rolled.
meanings_ja: 回転させる, スクールバスに乗る
example: I'm going to roll down the hill. / 私は坂を転がります。

definition_en: The condition or feeling of being safe; security; certainty.
example: The company prioritizes safety in its manufacturing process. / その会社は製造工程で安全性を優先しています。

definition_en: To pronounce.
example: "The CEO's saying reflects the company's values." / 「CEOの言葉は企業の価値を反映している。」

definition_en: (usually in the plural) Anything that is sold by itself, especially an article of clothing.
example: The company will separate its IT department to improve efficiency. / コンピレーションはIT部門を分離し、効率化を目指す。

definition_en: A number of things that follow on one after the other or are connected one after the other.
meanings_ja: 連続する作品や番組の集合体
example: The TV series is very popular. / テレビシリーズはとても人気がある。

definition_en: An act of putting the ball or shuttlecock in play in various games.
example: I will serve you dinner tonight. / 今夜はあなたに食事を提供します。

definition_en: An act of being of assistance to someone.
meanings_ja: 手伝い (in a more general sense, e.g. volunteer work)
example: The hotel's service was excellent. / ホテルのサービスは優秀でした。

definition_en: Closed, shut.
example: I shut the door to keep the cold out. /  froze to keep the cold out.

definition_en: A bounding straight edge of a two-dimensional shape.
From a specified time in the past.
example: I haven't been to Tokyo since 2010. / 2010年以降、私は東京にいっていません。

definition_en: The combination of circumstances at a given moment; a state of affairs.
example: The company is facing a difficult situation due to financial problems. / その会社は財務問題により困難な状況にある。

definition_en: Not large or big; insignificant; few in number.
meanings_ja: 尺码の低い (referring to physical size or measurement)
example: This smaller apartment is more convenient for us. / 私たちはこの小さいアパートがより都合のいい

definition_en: (ditransitive) To transfer goods or provide services in exchange for money.
example: The company sold a million units last year. / その会社は昨年百万個を販売した。

definition_en: (chiefly law enforcement) A solution; an explanation.
example: I need to solve this math problem. / mathsの問題を解決する必要があります。

definition_en: Unspecified or unknown (unlocated) place or location.
example: I'll meet you somewhere at 5pm. / 5時ごろ何処かで会おう。

definition_en: The state of moving quickly or the capacity for rapid motion; rapidity.
meanings_ja: rapideous movement (if referring to a quick movement or action)
example: The new sports car has high speed. / 新しいスポーツカーは高い速度を持つ。

definition_en: A phase.
meanings_ja: ステージ（技術的や芸術的な意味）
example: The actor stepped onto the stage to deliver his lines. / アクターは、セリフを述べるために舞台に足を踏みした。

definition_en: To begin, commence, initiate.
meanings_ja: 始まり (in a more general sense, e.g. "the starting point of a new project")
example: I'm starting my new job tomorrow / 明日、新しい仕事に始まる

definition_en: A condition; a set of circumstances applying at any given time.
example: The state of California has a diverse economy. / カリフォルニア州は多様な経済を持つ。

definition_en: Capable of producing great physical force.
example: I've been working out, so I'm getting stronger. / 私はトレーニングを続けており、強くなる。

definition_en: An artist’s or photographer’s workshop or the room in which an artist works.
meanings_ja: アートスタジオ, TVスタジオ (for television or film production)
example: I'm recording my album in a music studio. / 私はアルバムを音楽スタジオで録音しています。

definition_en: Miscellaneous items or objects; (with possessive) personal effects.
example: I'm tired of this stuff. / 私はこの物質がうんと疲れた。

definition_en: A stupid person; a fool.
meanings_ja: 無知な、愚鈍な (in a more formal or nuanced sense)
example: He made a stupid mistake. / 彼は愚かしい間違いをした。

definition_en: Senses relating to a thin, pointed object.
example: The fashion designer created a new style for the collection. / フッションデザイナーは、新しいスタイルをコレクションに作成した。

definition_en: To follow in order; to come next after; hence, to take the place of.
example: I studied hard and finally succeeded in getting a job. / 私は努力してようやく就職した。

definition_en: Resulting in success; assuring, or promoting, success; accomplishing what was proposed; having the desired effect
example: He is a successful businessman. / 彼は有力なビジネスマンです。

definition_en: (sometimes attributive) Something which supports.
meanings_ja: 支持する (for someone or something)
example: The team will support the new player. / チームは新しい選手を助けます。

definition_en: To cause (someone) to feel unusually alarmed or delighted by something unexpected.
example: I was surprised to see her at the party. / 私はパーティーで彼女を発見してびっくりした。

definition_en: A collection of organized things; a whole composed of relationships among its members.
example: The company has a system for reporting errors. / その会社には、エラーの報告システムがあります。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 捕捉された (in a figurative sense, e.g. an idea taken)
example: I've been taken to the hospital with an injury. / 私は傷みで病院に運ばれた。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 求める、奪う (in a negative sense)
example: I'm taking a break to relax. / 私はリラックスするために休みを取ります。

definition_en: A piece of work done as part of one’s duties.
example: I have a task to finish by the end of the day. / 今日の終わりに仕事を完了する任務があります。

definition_en: A set of draught animals, such as two horses in front of a carriage.
example: The company is divided into teams to improve productivity. / 会社は生産性を向上させるためにチームに分けられています。

definition_en: The organization of knowledge for practical purposes.
meanings_ja: システムや製造の技術
example: The company is investing heavily in technology to improve its manufacturing process. / その会社は、製造プロセスを改善するために技術に投資しています。

definition_en: Despite that; however.
example: I like music, though my sister doesn't. / 私は音楽が好きですが、姉は好きではありません。

meanings_ja: 多くの人々、多くの事物 (referring to large quantities of people or things)
example: The company has thousands of employees. / その会社には数千の社員がいる。

definition_en: A knot; a fastening.
example: I wore a tie to the meeting. / インタビューに出席するため、ネクタイを着た。

definition_en: The tip of the external ear.
meanings_ja: 小手勢 (指す方向や形状)
example: Can you give me a tip on how to improve my Japanese? / 日本語を良くするための提案を教えてください。

definition_en: A covering of linen, silk, or tapestry, spread over a dressing table in a chamber or dressing room.
example: The hotel has modern toilets. / ホテルは現代的なトイレを有します。

definition_en: A mechanical device intended to make a task easier.
example: The company uses a variety of tools to manage their projects. / その会社は、プロジェクトを管理するために多くのツールを使用しています。

definition_en: A member of a particular nomadic ethnic minority in Ireland, the Pavee.
example: Many travelers visit Japan every year. / 多くの旅行者が毎年日本を訪れる。

definition_en: An entertainment, outing, food, drink, or other indulgence provided by someone for the enjoyment of others.
meanings_ja: たべて食べる (for food or drink)
example: I'd like to treat my friend to dinner tonight. / 今夜、友人にディナーをねって行こう。

definition_en: Tested, hence, proven to be firm or reliable.
example: I tried to fix my car, but it didn't work. / 車を修理したが駄目だった。

definition_en: To attempt; to endeavour. Followed by infinitive.
example: I've been trying to learn this song, but it's really hard. / これらの歌を学ぶのにずっと努力していますが、結構難しいです。

definition_en: (heading) to make a non-linear physical movement.
meanings_ja: 回転した、方向を変えた (for physical or literal turning)
example: The company turned down my proposal. / 企業は私の提案を却下しました。

definition_en: A grouping based on shared characteristics; a class.
example: What are the types of cars available at this dealership? / このディーラーで販売している自動車の種類は何ですか？

definition_en: An occurrence of the interjection "uh".
example: "What are you doing tonight?" "Uh, I don't know yet." / 「今夜は何してるの？」「あ、まだ決まってない」

meanings_ja: ユニオン・キングドム（United Kingdom）
example: I'm going to visit my friend in the UK. / 私はUKの友人に会いに行く。

definition_en: Up to the time of (something happening).
meanings_ja: まですぐに, 最後まで
example: I'll stay here until my friend arrives. / 私は友達が来るまでここに留まる。

definition_en: The act of using.
example: The company has many uses for this new technology. / これらの新技術は多くの会社で使用されます。

definition_en: To utilize or employ.
meanings_ja: 適用する, 利用する
example: I'm using a laptop to write this essay. / 私はこのエッセイを執筆するためにラップトップを使用しています。

definition_en: The quality (positive or negative) that renders something desirable or valuable.
example: The company places a high value on employee satisfaction. / 会社は社員の満足に高い評価を置く。

definition_en: (physical) Visual perception.
example: The view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking. / 山頂からの眺望は息を呑むものであった。

definition_en: A small case, often flat and often made of leather, for keeping money (especially paper money), credit cards, etc.
meanings_ja: かばん (a more casual or informal term)
example: I lost my wallet yesterday. / あの日、私の財布を失ってしまった。

definition_en: A small case, often flat and often made of leather, for keeping money (especially paper money), credit cards, etc.
example: I lost my wallet. / 私の財布を失いました。

meanings_ja: ジョージ・ワシントン（アメリカ初代大統領）
example: The capital of the United States is Washington. / アメリカ合衆国の首都はワシントンです。

definition_en: To carry or have equipped on or about one's body, as an item of clothing, equipment, decoration, etc.
meanings_ja: 着用する (to wear something as a habit or due to external factors)
example: She's wearing high heels to impress her boss. / 彼女は上司に印象を与えるため高いヒールを履いています。

definition_en: (physical) Matter, material.
example: The weight of the package was too heavy to lift. / そのパッケージの重さは持つには重すぎました。

definition_en: Unexceptional or unimportant; blah.
example: I'll eat whatever you give me. / 私はあなたが提供する何でも食べます。

definition_en: Which of two.
example: Do you want to go to the movies whether they have a new release or not? / 映画が新作があるか否かを問わずにいくつもりですか?

definition_en: An uncertain duration of time, a period of time.
meanings_ja: その 間に, その 時間中に (additional meaning)
example: I'll study while you're watching TV. / 私はテレビを見ている間に勉強します。

definition_en: Something complete, without any parts missing.
example: I want to finish this whole project by next week. / このプロジェクトを次週までに完成したいです。

definition_en: Us
example: The wi-fi connection was slow. / Wi-Fi接続は遅かった。

definition_en: To conquer, defeat.
example: The team wins the game. / チームは試合に優勝した。

definition_en: To become wise.
example: He's a wise businessman. / 彼は賢明なビジネスマンです。

definition_en: Outside, externally. This is still used in the names of some civil parishes in England, e.g. St Cuthbert Without.
example: I'll eat dinner without you. / きみと一緒に夕食は食べません。

definition_en: (heading) Employment.
example: The company's new works in renewable energy are impressive. / その企業の新しい再生可能エネルギーに関する作業は印象的です。

definition_en: A strong feeling of anxiety.
example: I'm worried about my future. / 私は将来を心配している。

definition_en: Unfavorable; negative; not good.
meanings_ja: くせを悪化させること
example: The company's financial situation has become worse since the crisis. / その会社の財務状況は、危機以来更に悪化した。

definition_en: Value.
example: This new smartphone is worth $500. / この新しいスマートフォンは5千ドルの価値があります。

definition_en: To form letters, words or symbols on a surface in order to communicate.
example: The letter was written in her own hand. / 自分の手で書いた手紙です。

definition_en: (usually with negative) Thus far; up to the present; up to some specified time; still
example: I'm not sure yet, but I'll try. / 私はまだecidedじゃないけど、やります。

definition_en: The numeric symbol that represents the cardinal number zero.
example: The score was zero at halftime. / ヒットがゼロでハーフタイムのスコアは何も無し。

definition_en: A way or means of approaching or entering; an entrance; a passage.
meanings_ja: インターネットアクセス、ネットワークアクセス
example: The company granted access to the new software only to authorized employees. / その会社は新しいソフトウェアに対して承認された従業員のみにアクセスを許可した。

definition_en: A registry of pecuniary transactions; a written or printed statement of business dealings or debts and credits, and also of other things subjected to a reckoning or review.
example: The company's accounts showed a significant profit. / その会社の会計書籍は大きな利益を示した。

definition_en: To find fault with, blame, censure
meanings_ja: 犯人として指名された
攻められた、非難された
example: He was accused of stealing the money. / 彼は金銭を盗んだと非難された。

definition_en: An actual, real one; notably:
meanings_ja: 確実な, 実現された
example: The actual cost of the project was much higher than expected. / プロジェクトの実際的な費用は予定値を超えておりました。

definition_en: To join or unite (e.g. one thing to another, or as several particulars) so as to increase the number, augment the quantity or enlarge the magnitude, or so as to form into one aggregate.
meanings_ja: 付加された (in mathematics or logic)
example: The company added a new product to their lineup. / コンパニーは新製品をラインナップに増加させた。

definition_en: Any condition, circumstance, opportunity or means, particularly favorable to success, or to any desired end.
meanings_ja: 益な条件 (in a specific context, e.g. competition)
example: Taking the bus gives you an advantage in avoiding traffic congestion. / バスを取ることで交通渋滞に有利になる。

definition_en: Any condition, circumstance, opportunity or means, particularly favorable to success, or to any desired end.
example: What are the advantages of using this new technology? / これらの新技術の有利な点は何か？

definition_en: To harmonize in opinion, statement, or action; to be in unison or concord; to be or become united or consistent; to concur.
example: "I'm agreeing with my friend on this topic." / "私たちはこのトピックについて友達と合意しています。"

definition_en: The total, aggregate or sum of material (not applicable to discrete numbers or units or items in standard English).
example: The company reported significant amounts of revenue last quarter. / その-quarterに大きな収入があったと企業は報告した。

definition_en: To subject to analysis.
example: I need to analyze this data before presenting it. / このデータをまとめる前に分析する必要があります。

definition_en: To give public notice, especially for the first time; to make known
example: The company announced a new product launch. / その会社は新製品の発売を公式に発表した。

definition_en: To disturb or irritate, especially by continued or repeated acts; to bother with unpleasant deeds.
example: The constant noise was annoying. / その常連の音はとても不便だった。

definition_en: An annual publication; a book, periodical, journal, report, comic book, yearbook, etc., which is published serially once a year, which may or may not be in addition to regular weekly or monthly publication.
meanings_ja: 年度ごとの,ประจำปี
example: The annual report showed significant growth. / 年度報告書は著しい成長を示した。

definition_en: To be grateful or thankful for.
meanings_ja: 価値を実感された (in a broad sense)
example: The new employee was appreciated by his colleagues. / 新入社員は同僚たちから霊的に認められた。

definition_en: To be grateful or thankful for.
meanings_ja: 支持している,尊重している (when referring to valuing or respecting someone's work or ideas)
example: She appreciates my help in editing her paper. / 彼女は私の論文の編集に助けていることを評価しています。

definition_en: The act of drawing near; a coming or advancing near.
example: The company is taking a new approach to marketing. / 会社は新しいマーケティングの方法を取る。

definition_en: To show grounds for concluding (that); to indicate, imply.
example: He argued that the new policy was unfair. / 彼は、新しい政策が公平でないと弁論した。

definition_en: Man-made; of artifice.
meanings_ja: manufactured, synthesized (for scientific or chemical contexts)
example: The artificial turf felt weird under my feet. / 人工の芝は足元が気持ち悪かった。

definition_en: An incidental remark made quietly so as to be heard by the person to whom it is said and not by any others in the vicinity.
meanings_ja: 除く、控える (in some cases, this word can also mean to exclude or control something)
example: I set my worries aside and went to bed. /私はいくらかの心配を並びにしてbedに行きました。
I need to get some cash from the atm. / ATMからお金を借りたいのです。

definition_en: To pull toward without touching.
meanings_ja: 吸引された (物理的な力による吸引を指す)
example: The tourists were attracted to the city's beautiful scenery. / 観光客たちは、その美しい景色に誘われた。

definition_en: The arithmetic mean.
example: What's the average score of the class? / クラスの平均点は何ですか?

definition_en: To deal with a bank or financial institution, or for an institution to provide financial services to a client.
example: The bank's online banking system was down. / 銀行のオンライン銀行システムはダウンしていた。

definition_en: A structure that bars passage.
meanings_ja: 障害、障壁 (in a physical or metaphorical sense)
example: The company has erected a barrier to prevent unauthorized access. / その会社は無断入国のために柵を設置しました。

definition_en: Something from which other things extend; a foundation.
meanings_ja: 底（複数の意味がある場合は、基層もあり得る）
example: The company's financial base is shaky. / その会社の財務基盤は不安定です。

definition_en: In a fundamental, essential or basic manner
example: I love traveling basically because it helps me relax. / 私は大体的に旅行を愛しているが、リラックスすることが最大の理由です。

definition_en: A device used to power electric devices, consisting of a set of electrically connected electrochemical or, archaically, electrostatic cells. A single such cell when used by itself.
example: The new battery in my phone lasts a lot longer. / 私の携帯電話に新しい電池を入れて、長く使えるようになった。

definition_en: The anniversary of the day on which someone is born.
example: My bday is tomorrow, so let's have a party! / 明日は私の誕生日だから、パーティーしましょう！

definition_en: In a beautiful manner.
example: She sings beautifully. / 彼女はとても歌う。

definition_en: To arrive, come (to a place).
meanings_ja: つながる (in a figurative sense)
example: She is becoming more confident in her abilities. / 彼女は自分自身の能力に自信を持つようになった。

definition_en: Mental acceptance of a claim as true.
example: I have strong belief in God. / 私は強い神の信仰を持つ。

definition_en: An advantage; help or aid from something.
example: The new policy will benefit many small businesses. / 新しい政策は多くの小中企業に有利である。

definition_en: An advantage; help or aid from something.
meanings_ja: 優遇の効果, 促進の影響
example: The new policy has several benefits, including increased productivity and job satisfaction. / 新しい政策には、生産性や-job satisfactionを含む複数の有利な点があります。

definition_en: (modern British & Australian, short scale) a thousand million (logic: 1,000 × 1,000^2): 1 followed by nine zeros, 109; a milliard
(modern British & Australian, short scale) a thousand million (logic: 1,000 × 1,000^2): 1 followed by nine zeros, 109; a milliard
example: The company makes billions of dollars from selling software. / その会社はソフトウェアを販売して億万円以上儲ける。

definition_en: Any of various bladed or pointed hand weapons, originally designating an Anglo-Saxon sword, and later a weapon of infantry, especially in the 14th and 15th centuries, commonly consisting of a broad, heavy, double-edged, hook-shaped blade, with a short pike at the back and another at the top, attached to the end of a long staff.
meanings_ja: 資料 (in business or academic contexts)
example: The company's financial reports included several bills. / その会社の財務報告には数々の資料が含まれていた。

definition_en: To reserve (something) for future use.
example: I've booked a flight to Tokyo. / トーキョー行きのフライトを予約しました。

definition_en: To receive (something) from somebody temporarily, expecting to return it.
example: The company is borrowing money to finance its new project. / その会社は新プロジェクトのために金を貸借してfinancingしています。

definition_en: The woody part of a tree arising from the trunk and usually dividing.
example: The company has a branch in Tokyo. / 東京に支店があります。

definition_en: A conflagration; a flame.
example: The company is known for its high-quality brand of coffee. / その会社のコーヒーブランドは高品質で有名です。

definition_en: A finely cut gemstone, especially a diamond, cut in a particular form with numerous facets so as to maximize light return through the top (called "table") of the stone.
example: She's a brilliant scientist. / 彼女は優秀な科学者です。

definition_en: An adult male of domesticated cattle or oxen.
meanings_ja: ropsu () - A strong and powerful animal, often used to describe a person's physical strength or personality.
(ryūdō) - A type of stock market or investment term, referring to a strong and increasing trend.
example: The rugby player was a real bull on the field. / そのラグビープレイヤーは実に強いropsuでした。

definition_en: A group of similar things, either growing together, or in a cluster or clump, usually fastened together.
meanings_ja: 小束 (in botany, referring to a group of flowers or leaves)
example: I picked a bunch of fresh herbs from my garden. / わたしは庭で新鮮なハーブの一群を摘みました。

definition_en: A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
example: The company has many businesses in the Asia-Pacific region. / その会社はアジア太平洋地域に多くの商売を持つ。

definition_en: A close-fitting hat, either brimless or peaked.
example: The company has strict caps on employee salaries. / その会社は社員の給与に厳しい頭巾を設けている。

definition_en: An act of capturing; a seizing by force or stratagem.
meanings_ja: 映像や音声を記録する
example: The camera captured the stunning view of the sunset. / 夕日を見る映像をカメラで撮影した。

definition_en: Grief, sorrow.
example: She always cares about her children. / 彼女は子供たちのことを常に煩わす。

definition_en: A group, often named or numbered, to which items are assigned based on similarity or defined criteria.
example: The website has a search function that allows users to browse by category. / ウェブサイトには、ユーザーがカテゴリーで検索するための検索機能があります。

definition_en: A series of interconnected rings or links usually made of metal.
meanings_ja: 鎖鎚 (heavy metal chain), チェーン (necklace)
example: The company has a chain of stores across the country. / その会社は全国に店舗を展開しています。

definition_en: A person presiding over a meeting.
example: The chairman of the company made a surprising announcement. / その会社の会長は驚くべき発表をした。

definition_en: A slate or enamel board for writing on with chalk; a predecessor to a whiteboard.
example: The teacher wrote on the chalkboard to explain the lesson. / 教師は白板に書き、授業の説明をした。

definition_en: A confrontation; a dare.
example: The company issued a challenge to its employees to come up with innovative ideas. / その会社は従業員に新しいアイデアを提案する課題を出しました。

definition_en: To invite (someone) to take part in a competition.
example: This project is challenging, but I'll finish it. / このプロジェクトは難しくて、完了する。

definition_en: A situation in which the king is directly threatened by an opposing piece.
meanings_ja: 訪問、確認 (in a financial context)
example: The bank will process your checks on Friday. / 銀行は金曜日にはあなたの支払いを処理します。

definition_en: A figure or other artistic depiction of Jesus Christ.
example: Jesus is known as the Christ. / イエスはキリストとして知られる。

definition_en: A two-dimensional geometric figure, a line, consisting of the set of all those points in a plane that are equally distant from a given point (center).
example: The company's circles of influence have expanded globally. / その会社の影響範囲は世界的に広がりました。

definition_en: Removal of dirt.
meanings_ja: 清潔にする (to make something clean)
example: The company will cleans up the pollution. / その会社は汚染を取り払います。

definition_en: A customer, a buyer or receiver of goods or services.
example: Our company values its clients and provides excellent service. / 我々の会社はお客様を尊重し優秀なサービスを提供しています。

definition_en: Closed, shut.
example: The company is trying to get a closer relationship with their customers. / その会社は、顧客との関係をより近づけることを目指しています。

definition_en: A short symbol, often with little relation to the item it represents.
example: I need to crack the code to solve this puzzle. / パズルを解くためにはコードを破る必要があります。

definition_en: The act of combining, the state of being combined or the result of combining.
example: The combination of skills and experience made her an ideal candidate. / スキルと経験の組み合わせが彼女を理想的な候補者にした。

definition_en: A group sharing a common understanding, and often the same language, law, manners, and/or tradition.
meanings_ja: 共同体、コミュニティー
example: The community came together to help those affected by the natural disaster. / 自然災害にあたった人々を助けるために地域社会が協力した。

definition_en: To assess the similarities and differences between two or more things ["to compare X with Y"]. Having made the comparison of X with Y, one might have found it similar to Y or different from Y.
meanings_ja: comparable 以上の意味もありますが、主要な意味として評価することを挙げます。
example: The new smartphone is compared to last year's model. / 新しいスマートフォンは昨年のモデルと比較される。

definition_en: To be in battle or in a rivalry with another for the same thing, position, or reward; to contend
example: The two companies will compete for the contract. / 二社は当該の契約を競争して得る。

definition_en: A person or organization against whom one is competing.
meanings_ja: 对抗者 (in a broader sense, referring to individuals or organizations that compete with each other)
example: The company's main competitors are now entering the market. / その会社のメインの相手チームが今市場入りしています。

definition_en: A network of interconnected systems.
example: The new software has a complex algorithm. / 新しいソフトウェアには、複雑なアルゴリズムを持つ。

definition_en: To make complex; to modify so as to make something intricate or difficult.
example: My love life is complicated. / 私の恋愛生活は難解です。

definition_en: The act, process or ability of concentrating; the process of becoming concentrated, or the state of being concentrated.
example: The company's new production line requires high concentration to produce perfect products. / その新しい生産ラインでは、高い集中力を必要として、完璧な製品を生産する必要があります。

definition_en: That which affects one’s welfare or happiness. A matter of interest to someone. The adposition before the matter of interest is usually over, about or for.
example: The company has a concern about the new law affecting their business. / その会社は、新しい法律の影響が彼らのビジネスに与えることを問題点として考えています。

definition_en: The end, finish, close or last part of something.
example: The company's conclusion was to expand into new markets. / コングラメーションの結論は、新しい市場に展開することとなった。

definition_en: The act or method of controlling or directing
example: The company will conduct a thorough investigation. / その会社は徹底した調査を行う。

definition_en: The act of consulting together formally; serious conversation or discussion; interchange of views.
meanings_ja: 合宿、シンポジウム (in academic or professional contexts)
example: The company will be hosting a conference to discuss new product lines. / 会社は新製品の会議を開催する。

definition_en: A person in whom one can confide or share one's secrets: a friend.
example: I'm confident that I can finish this project on time. / 私はこのプロジェクトを日程通りに完了できる自信を持つ。

definition_en: To puzzle, perplex, baffle, bewilder (somebody).
example: The instructions were confusing, so I couldn't assemble the furniture. / 備え合わせの指示が分からないので、家具を組むことができなかった。

definition_en: To proceed with (doing an activity); to prolong (an activity).
example: The company will continue to support the local community. / その会社は地元のコミュニティを継続的に支援する。

definition_en: Serving to reduce a difficulty, or accessible with minimum difficulty; expedient.
example: This store is very convenient because it's open late. / この店は遅くまで開いているため、非常に便利です。

definition_en: A person who has converted to a religion.
example: I need to convert my dollars to yen. / 私はドルを円に変える必要があります。

definition_en: Having a slightly low temperature; mildly or pleasantly cold.
meanings_ja: 冷気に満ちた, 冷静な
example: He's the coolest guy I know. / 彼は知り合い中で最高の男です。

definition_en: A thin and usually jagged space opened in a previously solid material.
meanings_ja: 音を鳴らす (in this case, it's often translated as "to crack a joke")
example: The hiker had to stop and repair the small crack in his hiking boot. / ホイकरは、自分のホイキングブーツの小さい裂け目を止めて修理する必要がありました。

definition_en: Pertaining to culture.
example: The cultural festival was a huge success. / 文化フェスティバルは大成功だった。

definition_en: Money or other items used to facilitate transactions.
example: The company has diversified its currencies. / これらの企業は多様化した通貨を持つ。

definition_en: The generally unidirectional movement of a gas or fluid.
example: The current in this river is very strong. / この川の電流は非常に強い。

definition_en: (plural: data) A measurement of something on a scale understood by both the recorder (a person or device) and the reader (another person or device). The scale is arbitrarily defined, such as from 1 to 10 by ones, 1 to 100 by 0.1, or simply true or false, on or off, yes, no, or maybe, etc.
meanings_ja: データ（機器やシステムでの記録）
example: The company collects customer data to improve its services. / 社長は、顧客のデータを集めサービスを改善するために利用しています。

definition_en: To distribute among a number of recipients, to give out as one’s portion or share.
example: I've been dealing with a lot of stress lately. / 私は最近、ストレスに取り扱っています。

definition_en: An argument, or discussion, usually in an ordered or formal setting, often with more than two people, generally ending with a vote or other decision.
example: The students engaged in heated debates about the pros and cons of a new policy. / 学生たちは新しい政策の利点と欠点について熱烈に論争した。

definition_en: A group, set, or series of ten , particularly:
example: The company has been successful over the past decade. / その会社は過去10年間成功しています。

definition_en: To resolve (a contest, problem, dispute, etc.); to choose, determine, or settle
meanings_ja: 評価する (in a more abstract sense)
example: "I'm still deciding what to do with my life." / 「私の人生について決断を下すのにまだ時間がかかります。」

definition_en: The act of deciding.
example: The company's decisions were influenced by market trends. / その会社は市場の流れに影響された決断をした。

definition_en: To determine with precision; to mark out with distinctness; to ascertain or exhibit clearly.
meanings_ja: 分類された、規定された
example: The concept was well defined in the research paper. / この研究書では概念が明確に決められていた。

definition_en: Without question and beyond doubt.
example: I will definitely be there tomorrow. / 明日は、必ず行く。

definition_en: To set free from restraint or danger.
example: I will deliver the package tomorrow. / 我は明日packageを届けます。

definition_en: To set free from restraint or danger.
meanings_ja: 通報された (in the context of information or news being delivered)
example: The package was delivered to my doorstep yesterday. / パッケージは昨日、玄関前に手渡されました。

definition_en: To set free from restraint or danger.
meanings_ja: を届ける (transportation or delivery context)
example: The company is delivering new products to customers. / 社は新製品をクライアントに届けている。

definition_en: The act of conveying something.
meanings_ja: 予定された時間に物を届ける
example: Can you make a delivery to my office today? / あなたは私のオフィスに今日配達できるのですか？

definition_en: The desire to purchase goods and services.
meanings_ja: 需要がある、需要する (for needs or requirements)
example: The company demands a certain level of quality from its suppliers. / その会社は、その供給者から一定の品質を要求しています。

definition_en: To show how to use (something).
example: The new product will demonstrate its power. / 新製品はその力を導く。

definition_en: (followed by on or upon, formerly also by of) To be contingent or conditioned; to have something as a necessary condition; to hinge on.
meanings_ja: 任せる (in a situation where someone's fate is uncertain)
example: The project's success was depending on the new funding. / プロジェクトの成功は新しい出資に任せていた。

definition_en: To be entitled to, as a result of past actions; to be worthy to have.
example: She deserves a reward for her hard work. / 彼女は彼女の努力に報いるべきである。

definition_en: To plan and carry out (a picture, work of art, construction etc.).
meanings_ja: 意図的に作られた、計画された (in a broader sense)
example: The new product was designed to be more energy-efficient. / 新製品はエネルギー効率化を目的として作成された。

definition_en: A person who designs something, or who designs things as a profession.
meanings_ja: ashionデザイナー (fashion designer), インテリアデザイナー (interior designer) (when referring to a specific type of design)
example: The fashion designer created a stunning collection. / ファッションデザイナーのこのコレクションは素晴らしいです。

definition_en: To set the boundaries or limits of.
meanings_ja: 決める、判断する (for deciding or judging something)
example: I will determine the winner by counting the votes. / ボートをカウントして優勝者を決定する。

definition_en: To change with a specific direction, progress.
example: The company developed a new product last year. / その会社は去年の新製品を開発した。

definition_en: To change with a specific direction, progress.
meanings_ja: 成長中 (in a particular field or industry)
example: The company is developing new technology to improve efficiency. / 会社は効率を改善する新技術の開発中です。

definition_en: Gaming with one or more dice.
meanings_ja: 違う数字の組み合わせを決める
example: I rolled the dice and got a six. /私は6が出たさいころを転がしてみた。

definition_en: (manner) In a different way.
example: I want to try the new restaurant differently than my friends. / 私は友達と違うように、新しいレストランを試みたい。

definition_en: A digital option.
example: The company is going digital by creating an online platform. / その会社はオンラインプラットフォームを作成してデジタル化しています。

definition_en: To manage, control, steer.
meanings_ja: 指示する, 指向する
example: The company will direct all customers to their official website. / その会社はすべての顧客を公式ウェブサイトに指示します。

definition_en: In a direct manner; in a straight line or course.
example: I will speak directly to him. / 私は彼にストレートに話す。

definition_en: To vanish.
meanings_ja: はっきり見えない状態になる
example: The magic trick makes the coin disappear. / 魔術のトリックでコインが消え去る。

definition_en: To sadden or displease (someone) by underperforming, or by not delivering something promised or hoped for.
meanings_ja: 予期した以上のものでない
example: The movie was disappointing. / 映画は失望するに値しなかった。

definition_en: A thin, flat, circular plate or similar object.
example: I bought a new record album and put it on the disc. / 私は新しいレコードアルバムを買い、ディスクに並べました。

definition_en: Conversation or debate concerning a particular topic.
example: We had a long discussion about the project's future. / 私たちはプロジェクトの将来について長時間の談話をした。

definition_en: To provide an impetus for motion or other physical change, to move an object by means of the provision of force thereto.
meanings_ja: 自動的に働く (e.g. driven engine)
example: The company's success was driven by its innovative products. / その会社の成功は、新しい製品に基づいていた。

definition_en: To lose moisture.
example: The clothes were drying on the line. / 家具は線路に干していた。

definition_en: A man, generally a younger man.

example: This dude is a star player in the NFL. / このアメリカンフットボールのスター選手はアメフトのスター選手です。

definition_en: At a time in advance of the usual or expected event.
example: The earliest human settlements date back to 10,000 years ago. / 人類の初期の集落は10,000年前から始まる。

definition_en: Ability, the means to do something, particularly:
meanings_ja: 簡単な作業、問題ない状態
example: The new software will make it easier to edit documents. / 新しいソフトウェアはドキュメントの編集をやせてます。

definition_en: Education. Often used in set phrases such as phys ed, driver's ed, special ed, etc.

definition_en: One of the simplest or essential parts or principles of which anything consists, or upon which the constitution or fundamental powers of anything are based.
example: The company analyzed its elements to improve performance. / その会社はパフォーマンスを向上させるために基盤要素を分析した。

definition_en: A place other than here.

definition_en: In an emotional manner; displaying emotion.
An individual who provides labor to a company or another person.
example: The company has to ensure the well-being of its employees. / その会社は、その従業員の幸福を確保しなければならない。

definition_en: To make somebody able (to do, or to be, something); to give sufficient ability or power to do or to be; to give strength or ability to.
example: The new software will enable us to process faster. / 新しいソフトウェアで、我々は早く処理できるようになる。

example: She encouraged me to pursue my dreams. / 彼女は私の夢に向かって支持した。

example: The company is investing heavily in engineering to develop new products. / その会社は、新しい製品の開発に大いに投資している。

definition_en: To make a pledge to (someone); to promise, guarantee (someone of something); to assure.
example: I'll ensure the documents are signed by Friday. / 来週金曜日に文書を署名します。

definition_en: To go or come into an enclosed or partially enclosed space.
example: The company is entering a new market. / その会社は新しい市場に参画しています。

definition_en: To amuse (someone); to engage the attention of agreeably.
example: The concert was entertaining, but the music was too loud. / コンサートは面白かったけど、音楽が非常に聞こえなかった。

definition_en: To the full or entire extent.
example: I am entirely satisfied with the service. / 私は完全にそのサービスに満足しています。

definition_en: In a manner affecting the environment.

example: The company is working environmentally to reduce its carbon footprint. / その会社はカーボンフットプリントを減らすために自然環境に対して取り組んでいます。

definition_en: The collective property and liabilities of someone, especially a deceased person.

definition_en: In the end; at some later time, especially after a long time, a series of problems, struggles, delays or setbacks.

definition_en: An act of exchanging or trading.
example: I had an exchange with my friend about the movie. / 私は友人と映画についてやり取りしました。

definition_en: A chief officer or administrator, especially one who can make significant decisions on their own authority.
example: The company's executives decided to launch a new product. / その会社の最高経営層は新製品を発売することを決断した。

definition_en: The state of being, existing, or occurring; beinghood.
example: The concept of existence is a fundamental question in philosophy. / 哲学では、存在の概念が基本的な問題です。

definition_en: To change (something) from a smaller form and/or size to a larger one; to spread out or lay open.

definition_en: A range of values or locations.

definition_en: Anything that goes beyond what is ordinary.

definition_en: (degree) To an extreme degree.

definition_en: To be unsuccessful.

definition_en: To evoke an intense interest or attraction in someone.

definition_en: Frightening.
example: He was fearful of heights, so he avoided going to the top floor. / 彼は高い所が怖くて、頂階には行くことはなかった。

definition_en: One's structure or make-up: form, shape, bodily proportions.
example: The new smartphone has a lot of great features. /  新しいスマートフォンには多くのグレートな機能があります。

definition_en: One's structure or make-up: form, shape, bodily proportions.
example: This camera has many features that make it popular among photographers. / このカメラには、人気のある写真家たちに好ましい多くの特徴があります。

definition_en: The management of money and other assets.

definition_en: Related to finances.

definition_en: A point at which reflected or refracted rays of light converge.

definition_en: To violate (a woman); to rape.

definition_en: Auspicious.

definition_en: The structural elements of a building or other constructed object.

definition_en: Free; frank.

definition_en: Popularly or widely.

自殺を試みた状態にある

definition_en: To occur or take place.

definition_en: A time period of sixty minutes; one twenty-fourth of a day.

meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help!

meaning 1: 大きく印象的

example: The fireworks display was impressive. / フイアーワークスディスプレイは大きく印象的。

definition_en: A person considered alone, rather than as belonging to a group of people.

definition_en: The tendency to work persistently. Diligence.

definition_en: The tendency to work persistently. Diligence.

definition_en: Damage to the body of a human or animal.

I love trying Irish whiskey. / 私はイールランドのウィスキーが好きです。

definition_en: The action or an instance of flowing or coming out, an outflow, particularly:
example: The company has issued an apology for the issue. / 会社は問題に対し謝罪を発行した。

definition_en: To flow out, to proceed from, to come out or from.

definition_en: A pound (unit of weight).

example: The company's leading technology has revolutionized the industry. / その会社の先導的技術は、業界を혁新化した。

definition_en: A heavy, pliable, inelastic metal element, having a bright, bluish color, but easily tarnished; both malleable and ductile, though with little tenacity. It is easily fusible, forms alloys with other metals, and is an ingredient of solder and type metal. Atomic number 82, symbol Pb (from Latin plumbum).
meanings_ja: 指導, 監督 (指導や監督の意味がある場合)

definition_en: To start (a fire).

definition_en: To create or recite a list.
meanings_ja: 公開されたリストに記載されている
上場している（株式など）

definition_en: To start (a fire).
meanings_ja: Alcoholを含む飲み物を飲んだ状態 (e.g. drunk)
example: He's lit from too many beers tonight. / 彼は今夜のビールが多すぎて酩酊した。

definition_en: Word for word; not figuratively; not as an idiom or metaphor
example: I'm freezing literally! / 僕は本当に寒い!

definition_en: Lines

definition_en: A burden; a weight to be carried.

definition_en: A particular point or place in physical space.

definition_en: To become fastened in place.

meanings_ja: 関係づき, 合理的 (for "logical" as an adjective)

definition_en: The release of an arrow.

definition_en: A person who loses; one who fails to win or thrive.

definition_en: Administration; the use of limited resources combined with forecasting, planning, leadership and execution skills to achieve predetermined specific goals.

definition_en: (physical) Matter, material.

definition_en: A homogeneous mass of rock, not layered and without an obvious crystal structure.

definition_en: A fellow, comrade, colleague, partner or someone with whom something is shared, e.g. shipmate, classmate.

definition_en: Having meaning, significant.

definition_en: A prescribed quantity or extent.

definition_en: The state of being a minor; youth, the period of a person's life prior to reaching adulthood.
meanings_ja: 少数民族 (mainly refers to racial or ethnic minority groups)

definition_en: A set of tasks that fulfills a purpose or duty; an assignment set by an employer, or by oneself.

definition_en: Physical motion between points in space.

definition_en: A multituberculate.

definition_en: An aboriginal inhabitant of a region colonized by English-speaking people; in particular:
example: The native species of the forest is under threat. / 森の原生種が脅威にさらされている。

definition_en: To have an absolute requirement for.

definition_en: Refusal or withholding of assents; prohibition, veto
example: The test result was negative. / テスト結果はネガティブでした。
The company uses a global net to connect with customers. / その会社は、全世界を網状に繋ぎ顧客と連絡しています。

definition_en: To no extent, in no way.
meanings_ja: ないましての、無いままの
example: The new policy has no non-disclosure clauses. / 新しいポリシーには何も非開示条項がない。

definition_en: Easily discovered, seen, or understood; self-explanatory.
example: It's obvious that she loves him. / 彼女が彼を愛しているのは明白なことです。

definition_en: In an obvious or clearly apparent manner.
example: The new policy is obviously beneficial to the company. / その新しい政策は会社にとって明らかに有益です。

definition_en: An attack.
meanings_ja: 激しい、残酷な (for military or violent contexts)
example: The company's offensive marketing tactics were criticized. / その企業の宗旨外れなマーケティング戦略は非難された。

definition_en: To propose or express one's willingness (to do something).
example: The company made an offering to invest in the new project. / 会社は新プロジェクトの投資を行うお供え物を出した。

definition_en: To perform a work or labour; to exert power or strength, physical or mechanical; to act.
example: The hospital will operate on the patient tomorrow. / 病院は明日患者に対して手術を行う。

definition_en: To perform a work or labour; to exert power or strength, physical or mechanical; to act.
example: The company was operated by a group of investors. / その会社は投資家のグループによって運営されていた。

definition_en: The method by which a device performs its function.
meanings_ja: 手術 (in medical context), 実行 (in business or military context)
example: The company will launch a new operation in Asia. / アジアでの新しい作業を開始します。

definition_en: A subjective belief, judgment or perspective that a person has formed about a topic, issue, person or thing.
example: I value my friends' opinions. / 私は友達の評判を尊びます。

definition_en: A chance for advancement, progress or profit.
example: We took advantage of the opportunities to learn from our mistakes. / 我々は過ちから学ぶチャンスを捉えました。

definition_en: One of a set of choices that can be made.
example: We have many options to choose from. / たくさんの選択肢があります。

definition_en: To set in some sort of order.
meanings_ja: 依頼された (in a business or commercial context)
example: The customer ordered a sandwich and a salad. / CUSTOMERはサンドウィッチとサラダを依頼した。

definition_en: The beginning of something.
example: The origin of the universe is still unknown. / 宇宙の起源はまだ不明。

definition_en: Abroad.
example: I'm going overseas to study abroad. / 私は留学するため海外に旅行します。

definition_en: One who owns something.
example: The company's owners are responsible for its success. / その会社の所有者たちは成功に責任を持つ。

definition_en: Causing pain or distress, either physical or mental.
example: The doctor told me that the surgery would be painful. / 医者は手術が疼痛なと告げた。

definition_en: (focus) Especially, extremely.
example: I particularly enjoyed the concert. / 私はコンサートを特に楽しんだ。

definition_en: A button whose functions are pausing and resuming something, such as a DVD player, a video game or a computer.
example: I'll pause the video to take a break. / ビデオを止めるために休息します。

definition_en: Money received on payday as payment for work performed.
example: I receive my paycheck every two weeks. / 私は2週間毎に給料を受けます。

definition_en: To give money or other compensation to in exchange for goods or services.
example: I'm paying for my tuition fees. / 私は学費を取り扱っています。

definition_en: The act of performing; carrying into execution or action; execution; achievement; accomplishment; representation by action.
example: The company's performance in the market was impressive. / その会社は市場での活演が印象的でした。

definition_en: An advertisement by which individuals attempt to meet others with similar interests.
example: This is a personal matter. / このことは自分のことであります。

meanings_ja: 時期、状態 (物理科学や技術で用いられる場合)
example: The project went through several phases before its completion. / プロジェクトは複数の段階を経て完了した。

definition_en: A picture, especially a photographic image.
meanings_ja: 画像 (in a computer or digital sense)
example: I took a pic of my friend at the party. / 私はパーティーで友達の写真を撮影した。

definition_en: To grasp and pull with the fingers or fingernails.
example: I'm picking up some fresh vegetables from the market. / 私は新鮮な野菜を市場から買いに行きます。

definition_en: A large post, often used as supporting architecture.
example: The company is built on three pillars - innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction. / その会社は三つの基本的要素（innovation、quality、customer satisfaction）に基づいて構築されている。

definition_en: A person who steers a ship, a helmsman.
example: The pilot safely landed the plane. / 航空士はplaneを安全に着陸させた。

definition_en: To design (a building, machine, etc.).
meanings_ja: 提案、策略 (if referring to a plan or strategy)
example: I'm doing some planning for my vacation. / わたしは旅行の計画をしている。

definition_en: A raised stage from which speeches are made and on which musical and other performances are made.
meanings_ja: 舞台、プラットフォーム
example: The company will launch its new product on a global platform. / この会社はグローバルなプラットフォームで新製品を発売します。

definition_en: A positive quantity.
example: I need to add 10 more hours of study time, plus another project. / 私は10時間の勉強時間を加算し、また一つのプロジェクトも必要です。

definition_en: To provide power for (a mechanical or electronic device).
meanings_ja: パワーを得る、力づける
example: The new smartphone is powered by a high-capacity battery. / 新しいスマートフォンは高容量バッテリーで電源を持つ。

definition_en: A statement of what will happen in the future.
example: The weather forecast predicted a storm would hit tomorrow. / きょうは嵐が襲うと天気予報では予測していた。

definition_en: A pressing; a force applied to a surface.
example: The pressure to finish the project on time is huge. / 時間ぎりぎりのプロジェクトを完了する強い影響は大きい。

definition_en: To stop (an outcome); to keep from (doing something).
example: The new security system prevents unauthorized access. / 新しいセキュリティシステムは、無効なアクセスを予防する。

definition_en: An existing criminal record (short for "previous convictions")
example: The previous meeting was cancelled due to the weather. / 前回の会議は悪天候により中止された。

definition_en: A primary election; a preliminary election to select a political candidate of a political party.
example: The primary school is responsible for elementary education. / 小学校は小学校教育を担当します。

definition_en: A fundamental assumption or guiding belief.
example: The company operates on a principle of transparency. / その企業は透明性の基本原則に基づいて運営している。

definition_en: A fundamental assumption or guiding belief.
example: The company's principles emphasize fairness and transparency. / その会社の基本原則は公平と透明性を重視しています。

definition_en: Total income or cash flow minus expenditures. The money or other benefit a non-governmental organization or individual receives in exchange for products and services sold at an advertised price.
meanings_ja: 収入（しゅうにゅう）, 損益（そんえき）
example: The company's profits increased significantly last quarter. / その会社は前期に利益が著しく増加した。

definition_en: Movement or advancement through a series of events, or points in time; development through time.
example: The company's progress has been impressive. / その会社の進歩は印象的でした。

definition_en: To commit to (some action or outcome), or to assure (a person) of such commitment; to make an oath or vow.
example: I promised to meet her at 7pm tonight. / 今夜7時までに彼女と会う約束しました。

definition_en: In a proper manner, appropriately, suitably; correctly, justifiably
example: I'll properly prepare for the exam. / 私は正しく試験の準備をします。

definition_en: To apply a force to (an object) so that it comes toward the person or thing applying the force.
example: He's been pulling all night to meet the deadline. / 彼は締め切りを迎えるため、夜中も力を尽くしている。

definition_en: The acquisition of title to, or property in, anything for a price; buying for money or its equivalent.
meanings_ja: 購入料金 (in business or commercial contexts)
example: I'm going to purchase a new laptop. / 新しいラップトップを買います。

definition_en: An objective to be reached; a target; an aim; a goal.
example: What are the purposes of this new policy? / この新しい政策の目的は何ですか?

definition_en: A short, directed application of force; an act of pushing.
meanings_ja: 勧める、促す (in a figurative sense)
example: He pushes himself to finish the project on time. / 彼はプロジェクトを完了するまで自力で駆動した。

definition_en: To place something somewhere.
example: I'm putting my effort into learning Japanese. / 私は日本語を学ぶことに尽力しています。

definition_en: Level of excellence.
example: The quality of this product is excellent. / この製品の乾度は抜群です。

definition_en: (physical) To cause to rise; to lift or elevate.
meanings_ja: 上昇した (in this sense, it means to increase or rise)
example: The company raised its prices last year. / その会社は昨年価格を上げた。

definition_en: A roving motion; course without definite direction; lack of rule or method; chance.
meanings_ja: あり得る様々な選択肢 (in statistics or computer science)
example: The random number generator produced a string of seemingly unrelated numbers. / ランダムナンバー生成器は何の前後もなく見える数字の列を生み出した。

definition_en: The worth of something; value.
example: What's the rate of this taxi? / これのタクシーはどのくらいの評価ですか?

definition_en: The state of being actual or real.
example: The movie showed a harsh reality of war. / 戦争のハルシュリアリティを映画は示した。

definition_en: To make real; to convert from the imaginary or fictitious into reality; to bring into real existence
meanings_ja: 自分の意識において認める
example: I finally realized that I was in love. / 僕はついに恋を実感した。

definition_en: To make real; to convert from the imaginary or fictitious into reality; to bring into real existence
example: I was realizing that my dream was impossible. / 私は自分の夢が不可能であると実感した。

definition_en: To bend back (light, etc.) from a surface.
example: The company will reflect on its mistakes and make changes. / 会社は過ちを考え直し、改善する。

definition_en: The act of reflecting or the state of being reflected.
meanings_ja: 照光、反射 (物理的な意味も含む)
example: The mirror showed a perfect reflection of her beautiful smile. / 彼女の美しい笑顔が鏡に映しめられた。

definition_en: To tell in a descriptive way.
example: The two companies have a related project. / その二つの会社は類似したプロジェクトを持つ。

definition_en: Someone in the same family; someone connected by blood, marriage, or adoption.
example: My cousin is my relative. / 私の姪は私の親戚です。

definition_en: Proportionally, in relation to some larger scale thing.
example: This new policy is relatively fair compared to the old one. / この新しい政策は比較的公平です。

definition_en: (chiefly in the plural) That which is left; relic; remainder.
example: The project will remain unfinished without more funding. / プロジェクトはさらに資金がなければ完了されません。

definition_en: An element of broadcast programming originating away from the station's or show's control room.
meanings_ja: 手探り（not common in Japan, but used in some technical contexts）
example: The TV remote control was lost. / テレビのリモートコントロールが見つからなかった。

definition_en: A state where sovereignty rests with the people or their representatives, rather than with a monarch or emperor; a country with no monarchy.
example: The United States is a democratic republic. / アメリカ合衆国は民主主義の共和国です。

definition_en: To ask (someone) for something; to request.
example: This course requires a strong foundation in math. / このコースでは数学の基礎が必要です。

definition_en: To ask (someone) for something; to request.
example: The new policy requires all employees to attend a training session. / 新しいポリシーは、すべての従業員が研修セッションに参加することを要求する。

definition_en: Something that one uses to achieve an objective, e.g. raw materials or personnel.
meanings_ja: 資源、資材 (in a broader sense)
example: The company is investing in resources to improve its manufacturing process. / その会社は製造プロセスを改善するためにリソースを投資しています。

definition_en: To say something in return; to answer; to reply.
meanings_ja: 反応した (especially in a scientific or technical context)
example: When I asked for help, she responded immediately. / 私は助けを求めただっきく、彼女は即座に返答した。

definition_en: To say something in return; to answer; to reply.
example: The team is responding quickly to the crisis. / クライシスに対しチームは速く答え返しています。

definition_en: To move, or appear to move, physically upwards relative to the ground.
example: The sun will rise tomorrow. / 明日、太陽は上がります。

definition_en: A possible adverse event or outcome
example: The company took a risk by investing in a new market. / 会社は新しい市場に投資したが、損害の可能性があった。

definition_en: Any of various passerine birds (about 100 species) of the families Muscicapidae, Turdidae and Petroicidae (formerly Eopsaltriidae), typically with a red breast.
meanings_ja: ロビン (in computing, a robot-like object that performs tasks)
example: The robin sang sweetly in the garden. / フクロウは庭で美しい歌を歌った。

definition_en: To cause to revolve by turning over and over; to move by turning on an axis; to impel forward by causing to turn over and over on a supporting surface.
meanings_ja: まとめられた, 承認された
example: The ball was rolled across the floor. / フロアを横切ってボールが円形にされました。

definition_en: To cause to revolve by turning over and over; to move by turning on an axis; to impel forward by causing to turn over and over on a supporting surface.
meanings_ja: 続く (in a continuous or gradual manner)
example: The rolling hills of Tuscany were breathtaking. / トスカーナの ころがる ヒルズは 驚嘆するほど美しかった。

definition_en: In a rough manner; without kindness, softness, or gentleness.
example: The new policy will be implemented roughly by next year. / 新しい政策は、次の年間程まで実施される。

definition_en: (sometimes in the plural) The remains of a destroyed or dilapidated construction, such as a house or castle.
example: The ancient city's ruins were hidden in the jungle. / 古代都市の遺跡はジャングルに隠れていた。

definition_en: In a sad manner; sorrowfully.
example: I'll miss you sadly. / 私はあなたをเศさに置き去ります。

definition_en: In a safe manner; without risk; using caution above all else.
meanings_ja: 無害に (for physical or environmental safety)
example: I will drive to the store safely tonight. / 今日夜には店に安全に運転します。

definition_en: A reduction in cost or expenditure.
example: I'm trying to increase my savings. / 私は自分の収入を増やすことを目指しています。

definition_en: A ladder; a series of steps; a means of ascending.
example: The company plans to scale up its production to meet growing demand. / その会社は需要が増えていることを満たすために生産を拡大する計画を立てています。

definition_en: To create a time-schedule.
example: The flight is scheduled for 9am. / 9時からの飛行は計画的です。

definition_en: The total number of goals, points, runs, etc. earned by a participant in a game.
meanings_ja: 成績 (in a test or competition)
音楽のスコア (a set of musical notes)
example: The team scored 3 points in the game. / チームはゲームで3点を取った。

definition_en: A physical divider intended to block an area from view, or provide shelter from something dangerous.
meanings_ja: パノラマのスクリーン
テレビ、コンピューターのスクリーン (複数の意味あり)
example: The new smartphone has a high-quality screen. / 新しいスマートフォンには高画質なスクリーンがあります。

definition_en: To put an object into a place where it will rest; to fix; to set firm.
meanings_ja: 対面する、向かって座る
example: The meeting attendees were seated. / 会議参加者たちは座席に座っていた。

definition_en: Second, 1/60 of a minute.
example: The meeting will start at 3 PM, sec. The speaker is expected to finish by 4 PM. / 会議は午後3時、秒から始まり、午後4時に終わるとの予定です。

definition_en: A process by which heritable traits conferring survival and reproductive advantage to individuals, or related individuals, tend to be passed on to succeeding generations and become more frequent in a population, whereas other less favourable traits tend to become eliminated; the differential survival and reproduction of phenotypes.
meanings_ja: 集合 (in statistics and computer science)
example: The company made a selection of employees for the new project. / 会社は、新プロジェクトのために従業員を選んだ。

definition_en: The act of disuniting two or more things, or the condition of being separated.
example: The couple's separation was a shock to their friends. / 彼らは友人達にとって驚きのことになった離別だった。

definition_en: An act of being of assistance to someone.
meanings_ja: 業務 (in a broader sense, including administrative or operational tasks)
example: The company offers various services to its customers. / その会社は、多くのサービスを顧客に対して提供しています。

definition_en: (personal) To provide a service (or, by extension, a product, especially food or drink).
meanings_ja: 食卓でのサービス (in a restaurant or hotel setting)
example: The waitstaff is serving us tonight. / 今夜はウェイターさんが私たちにサービスを行っています。

definition_en: To conclude or resolve (something):
meanings_ja: 住む, 支払う (複数の意味があるため、主要な2つの意味を列挙しました)
example: I will settle my bill tomorrow / 私は明日支払う

definition_en: To give part of what one has to somebody else to use or consume.
example: The company's shared vision inspires its employees. / その会社の共有されたビジョンは、従業員を熱烈に励ます。

definition_en: A portion of something, especially a portion given or allotted to someone.
example: The company issued shares to raise capital. / その会社は資金を調達するために株式を発行した。

definition_en: That which has significance; a sign; a token; a symbol.
example: The new policy will have a significant impact on the company's profits. / その新しい政策は会社の利益に大きく影響する。

definition_en: Closeness of appearance to something else.
example: The two theories have a similarity in their approaches. / その2つの理論はアプローチに似ている。

definition_en: That which is thin and broad.
example: I took a slice of pizza. / 私はピザの小切れを取った。

definition_en: Encoded computer instructions, usually modifiable (unless stored in some form of unalterable memory such as ROM).
meanings_ja: コンピュータプログラム
プログラムソフトウェア
example: I need to update my software to run the new game. / 新しいゲームを動かすため、ソフトウェアを更新する必要があります。

definition_en: A homogeneous mixture, which may be liquid, gas or solid, formed by dissolving one or more substances.
example: The scientist found a solution to the environmental problem. / 科学者は環境問題の解決を発見した。

definition_en: To find an answer or solution to a problem or question; to work out.
example: I finally solved the puzzle! / 私はようやくパズルを解決しました!

definition_en: In one way or another; in a way not yet known or explained; by some means
meanings_ja: やるには困難だが、できた
example: I managed to finish the project somehow. / 私は何とかプロジェクトを終わらせました。

definition_en: More or less; a certain quantity or degree; a part, more or less; something.
example: I'm somewhat busy today. / 今日はちょっと忙しいです。

definition_en: A general type.
example: Can you sort these files by date? / は日付でこれらのファイルを分類してください。

definition_en: The person, place or thing from which something (information, goods, etc.) comes or is acquired.
example: The source of the river is in the mountains. / 山脈にある河川の源はです。

definition_en: A distinguishing attribute or quality.
example: The scientist was studying a specific type of bacteria. / 兵器は特定的種類の細菌を研究しています。

definition_en: In a specific manner, applying to or naming a particular thing or things, expressly, explicitly
example: The company will expand specifically into the Asian market. / その会社はアジア市場に特に展開します。

definition_en: A building, wing or dependency set apart and adapted for lodging and feeding (and training) animals with hoofs, especially horses.
example: The horse was kept in a stable. / 馬は馬小屋に預けられました。

definition_en: A phase.
example: The concert has been held on many stages around the world. / 世界中の多くの会場でコンサートが開催されています。

definition_en: A principle or example or measure used for comparison.
meanings_ja: 定められた基準、標準規格
example: The company sets a standard of quality for its products. / その会社は製品の質の標準を設定します。

definition_en: To declare to be a fact.
example: The company stated that it would increase its investment. / 会社は投資を増やすと表明した。

definition_en: A declaration or remark.
example: The company made a statement about their new product. / 会社は新製品についての公式の申し合わせを発表した。

definition_en: Continuance or a period of time spent in a place; abode for an indefinite time; sojourn.
example: She will stay at home tonight. / 彼女は今夜自宅に残る。

definition_en: A store or supply.
example: The company's stock has been rising steadily. / 会社の資材は穏やかに上昇している。

definition_en: The science and art of military command as applied to the overall planning and conduct of warfare.
example: The company will implement new strategies to increase sales. / その会社は新しい売り上げ増加を目指すために新しい計画を実施します。

definition_en: The science and art of military command as applied to the overall planning and conduct of warfare.
example: The company implemented a new strategy to increase sales. / 会社は販売を増加するために新しい実現計画を実施した。

definition_en: A small river; a large creek; a body of moving water confined by banks.
meanings_ja: 流れの並び（複数の水流）
example: The camera followed the streams as they flowed through the forest. / 森を通る小川が、小川のように流れて行った。

definition_en: Strained; drawn close; tight.
meanings_ja: Strictに留意する (for the sense of being cautious or vigilant)
example: The teacher was very strict about punctuality. / 教師は遅刻を厳しく注意していた。

definition_en: In a successful manner; with success; without failing.
example: I successfully completed my project. / 私はプロジェクトを成功的に完了した。

definition_en: The act of supplying.
example: The company will supply us with the new equipment. / その会社は私たちに新しい機器を供給します。

definition_en: A procedure involving major incisions to remove, repair, or replace a part of a body.
example: The patient needs surgery to remove the tumor. / 腫瘍を除去する手術が必要です。

definition_en: A collection of organized things; a whole composed of relationships among its members.
meanings_ja: 技術システム, 組織システム (in a broader sense)
example: The company has implemented new human resources systems to improve employee satisfaction. / その会社は従業員の満足度を向上させるため、新しい人事システムを導入しました。

definition_en: An account of an asserted fact or circumstance; a rumour; a report, especially an idle or malicious story; a piece of gossip or slander; a lie.
example: The tale of the brave knight was passed down for generations. / 勇敢な騎士の物語は幾十年にわたって伝えられてきた。

definition_en: A marked natural ability or skill.
meanings_ja: 才能、才能 (natural ability or aptitude)
example: She has a great talent for singing. / 彼女は歌唱の才能を持つ。

definition_en: The organization of knowledge for practical purposes.
example: The company is developing new technologies to improve customer service. / その会社は、新しい技術を開発して、クライアントサービスの向上に努めている。

definition_en: (Old English law) To make a tender of; to offer or tender.
meanings_ja: できる方向に進行する
example: The hospital tends to many patients with serious injuries. / 病院は多くの重傷者を受け入れる。

definition_en: That which limits the extent of anything; limit, extremity, bound, boundary.
example: The company has set new terms for its employees. / 会社は従業員に新しい契約条件を設定した。

definition_en: A long, thin and flexible form of material, generally with a round cross-section, used in sewing, weaving or in the construction of string.
example: The thread of the story was interesting. / 物語の紡糸は興味深かった。

definition_en: (manner) In this way or manner.
meanings_ja: そのように (this is an adverbial translation, indicating a manner)
example: He decided to quit his job thus. / 彼は、そのような理由で仕事を辞めることにした。

definition_en: To provide with a tip; to cover the tip of.
meanings_ja: 提供分け (to give something extra as a tip or bonus)
質問の答え (to answer a question, literally "tip" meaning to give a hint or suggestion)
example: I liked the service at this restaurant so much that I left a big tipping. / そのレストランではサービスが良く、提供分けを大きくした。

definition_en: A unit of weight (mass) equal to 2240 pounds (a long ton) or 2000 pounds (a short ton) or 1000 kilograms (a metric ton).
meanings_ja: 音量の大きさ (especially in music)
example: The concert hall has a ton of sound systems. / コンサートハールには大きな音響設備が多い。

definition_en: An amount obtained by the addition of smaller amounts.
example: The total cost of the trip was $500. / 旅の総額は500ドルです。

definition_en: To the fullest extent or degree.
example: I'm totally exhausted after working all night. / 私は夜通し仕事して疲れた状態です。

definition_en: A person who obtains things by force; a thug or bully.
example: He's a tough guy who can handle any challenge. / 彼はどんな試練にも耐えうる強い男です。

definition_en: In the direction of.
meanings_ja: むかえる (to approach or move closer)
example: The company is moving towards a more sustainable future. / 会社はより持続可能な未来に向かう。

definition_en: Buying and selling of goods and services on a market.
example: I'm going to trade my old phone for a new one. / 私は古い電話を新しいものに交換します。

definition_en: A person with traditional beliefs.
meanings_ja: 伝統的な (for customs, practices) / 標準的な (for methods, procedures)
example: The traditional cooking method in Japan involves grilling meat. / 日本の料理では、焼き肉を中心に古典的な調理方法を使う。

definition_en: In a traditional manner.
meanings_ja: 古くからの慣習に従って
example: In Japan, traditionally people wear kimonos on special occasions. / 日本では、特別なoccasionには伝統的に着物を着ます。

definition_en: To practice an ability.
meanings_ja: 将棋された、指導された
example: The company has trained many new employees in the past year. / その会社は最近一年間、新しい従業員を多くの技術的な訓練を受けさせました。

definition_en: A person who trains another; a coach.
meanings_ja: 指導者、コーチ (in a sports or educational context)
example: The new trainer helped me improve my running skills. / 新しいトレーナーによって、私の走るスキルが向上しました。

definition_en: To practice an ability.
example: The company offers training programs to improve employees' skills. / 会社は従業員のスキル向上を目的としてトレーニングプログラムを提供しています。

definition_en: To negotiate, discuss terms, bargain (for or with).
example: The doctor is treating a patient with cancer. / ドクターはがん患者の訪問療法を行っている。

definition_en: (manner) In accordance with the facts; truthfully, accurately.
example: I truly appreciate your help. / 私はあなたの助けを本当に感謝しています。

definition_en: Confidence in or reliance on some person or quality.
meanings_ja: 他人に頼ることを意味する信頼
example: I trust you to handle this important project. / 私はこの重要なプロジェクトをあなたに任せる。

definition_en: (sometimes proscribed) To tweet; to post an update to Twitter.
example: She tweeted about her daily life. / 彼女は日常生活についてツイートした。

definition_en: An expression used to show contentment for something
meanings_ja: うむ (to think or to hesitate)
ああ (a filler word expressing agreement or confirmation)
example: "I'm not sure if I want to go." / "私は行くかどうか決断できません。"

definition_en: To make ugly
example: The new policy was unfair to small businesses. / 新しい政策は小規模企業に対して不公平だった。

definition_en: Happening through bad luck, or because of some unfortunate event.
example: I won the lottery, unfortunately, it was just enough to pay off my debts. / 賞金を当たったけど、運が悪く借金を完済するにとどまった。

definition_en: A particular, minute unit of mass, defined differently for different substances, but so that varying substances of the same general type have the property that one international unit of the one has the same effect on the human body as one international unit of the other.
meanings_ja: 部門、グループ (in a corporate or organizational sense)
example: The company has several units working on different projects. / その会社は複数の部門が異なるプロジェクトに取り組んでいます。

definition_en: Except on a specified condition; if not.
example: I'll go to the party unless it rains. / 私は雨が降るまではパーティーに行く。

definition_en: Not safe (various senses); dangerous.
meanings_ja: 娘のない、安全でない (if referring to a place or situation that is not secure)
example: The construction site was unsafe, so we had to evacuate. / 建設現場は危ないため撤退しなければならなかった。

definition_en: Being the target of an action.
example: The decision was made upon careful consideration. / 決定は慎重な検討の上にされた。

definition_en: Disturbance or disruption.
